mapper.select: select count(*) from board where BOARD_VISIBLE=1
select * from (select rownum rnum, a.* from (select * from board where BOARD_VISIBLE=1 order by BOARD_CREATEDATE desc)a)
mapper.insert: insert into board(BOARD_NUM, BOARD_WRITER, BOARD_SUBJECT, BOARD_CONTENT,BOARD_CREATEDATE, BOARD_MODIFYDATE, BOARD_VISIBLE, BOARD_RECOMMAND, BOARD_READCOUNT, BOARD_SECTION) values(board_num_seq.nextval, #{boardWriter}, #{boardSubject}, #{boardContent}, sysdate, sysdate, 1, #{boardRecommand}, #{boardReadCount}, #{boardSection})
mapper.update: update board set BOARD_READCOUNT=BOARD_READCOUNT+1 where board_num=#{boardNum}
update board set BOARD_VISIBLE=0 where board_num=#{boardNum}
